name: Great American Ballpark
comments: Home field of the Cincinnati Reds with concessions, a Hall of Fame museum & a panoramic eatery.

name: Paul Brown Stadium
comments: The NFL's Cincinnati Bengals play at this traditional open-air stadium that seats more than 65,000.

name: US Bank Arena
comments: Large arena for Cyclones hockey games & other events plus a bar & grill overlooking the main floor.
